mapper.select: SELECT CEIL (COUNT(lh.emp_no)/#{param1}) AS pages FROM leave_history lh JOIN leave_management lm ON lh.emp_no = lm.emp_no WHERE lh.emp_no = #{param2}

SELECT lh.emp_no, lh.annual AS total_leave, COALESCE(SUM(lm.leave_use), 0) AS use_leave, lh.annual - COALESCE(SUM(lm.leave_use), 0) AS balance_leave FROM leave_history lh LEFT JOIN leave_management lm ON lh.emp_no = lm.emp_no GROUP BY lh.emp_no, lh.annual order by '총휴가일' limit 1
